solution_line_template: The total number of pages is {book1_pages} + {book2_pages} = <<{book1_pages}+{book2_pages}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages
The number of pages Yasna needs to read every day for two weeks is {total_pages} / {days_in_two_weeks} = <<{total_pages}/{days_in_two_weeks}={pages_per_day}>>{pages_per_day} pages
